alert.note: Alert for Craven; Jones; Pamlico (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 16 at 8:39PM EDT until May 16 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL JONES...CENTRAL CRAVEN AND WEST CENTRAL PAMLICO COUNTIES... At 838 PM EDT, a possible tornado was located over Coastal Carolina Regional Airport, or over James City, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Weather spotters reported tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... New Bern, James City, Trent Woods, River Bend, Rhems, Olympia, Fairfield Harbour, Coastal Carolina Regional Airport and Bridgeton. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall may hide this tornado. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW! Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW! If a tornado or other severe weather is spotted, call the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889- 6889. This act may save lives of others in the path of dangerous weather.
